clinical_study.brief_title: Acupuncture for Diabetic Gastroparalysis: a Randomized Controlled Trial

lead_sponsor.agency: The First Affiliated Hospital of Hunan University of Traditional Chinese Medicine

clinical_study.source: The First Affiliated Hospital of Hunan University of Traditional Chinese Medicine

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the different combination of acupoints have different effect on diabetic gastroparalysis.

primary_outcome.description: GCSI means gastroparesis cardinal symptom index

arm_group.description: acupoints comination 1 includes the specific acupoint ST36 (Zusanli) and a local acupoint CV12 (Zhongwan).
acupoints comination 2 includes the specific acupoint ST36 (Zusanli) and a distal acupoint PC6(Neiguan).
sham acupoints combination includes the specific acupoint ST36 (Zusanli) and a sham acupoint.
